com.actinarium.rhythm.layer

Class Fill

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.actinarium.rhythm.layer.Fill
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RhythmSpecLayer

    public class Fill
extends java.lang.Object
implements RhythmSpecLayer
    A layer that fills all provided area with solid color. You will usually want to use it inside Inset to draw rectangles (margins, gutters etc).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Fill.Factory
      A default factory that creates new Fill layers from config lines according to the docs

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      protected android.graphics.Paint mPaint 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Fill()
      Create a layer that fills current bounds with solid color

    • Method Detail

      • setColor

        public Fill setColor(int color)
        Set fill color
        Parameters:
        color - Fill color, in #AARRGGBB format as usual
        Returns:
        this for chaining

      • draw

        public void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                 android.graphics.Rect drawableBounds)
        Description copied from interface: RhythmSpecLayer
        Draw itself to the provided canvas within provided bounds according to internal configuration (if any)
        Specified by:
        draw in interface RhythmSpecLayer
        Parameters:
        canvas - Canvas for the layer to draw itself to
        drawableBounds - Bounds where this layer should draw itself. Since these are the bounds of a RhythmDrawable connected to the view, they are usually the same as the view’s bounds, so you can use this parameter to get the view’s dimensions should you need them.
